text:
• A one-third reduction of the 1990 child deaths from
acute respiratory infections.
• Basic education for all children and completion of
primary education by at least 80 per cent - girls as wellas boys.
• Clean water and safe sanitation for all communities.• Acceptance in all countries of the Convention of the
Rights of the Child, including improved protection forchildren in especially difficult circumstances.
• Universal access to high-quality family planning
information and services.
